casebody.data:
No. 09-996. James Walker, Warden, et al., Petitioners v. Charles W. Martin. 562 U.S. 821, 131 S. Ct. 379,

178 L. Ed. 2d 15,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6172. October 4, 2010.

Motion of respondent for appointment of counsel granted. Michael B. Bigelow, Esquire, of Sacramento, California, is appointed to serve as counsel for the respondent in this case.
